title: Classes | Kunsang Gar Meditation Center
description: Naga Sutra, Ancient practices for healing environmental and personal imbalance. Natural Mind Meditation, Pure Dzogchen in the Bön Rimé tradition, Losar, Tibetan New Year, Key to Vital Awareness, Heart Sutra
